Name: OTTO'S IRRESISTIBLE DANCE
Description: Choose onecreature thatyoucan see within range. Thetarget begins acomicdance inplace:shuffling,tappingitsfeet,and capering forthe duration. Creatures thatcan't becharmed are immune tothis spell.Adancing creature must use aliitsmovement todance without leavingitsspace and has disadvantageonDexterity saving throws and attack rolls.Whilethe target isaffected bythis spell, other creatureshaveadvantage onattack rollsagainst it.Asanaction, adancing creature makes aWisdom savingthrow toregain control ofitself.Onasuccessful save.thespell ends.
